resources.string: ZeroHunger_App
Together, we fight hunger and promote sustainable agriculture.\nBe part of the solution for a better tomorrow.
Donate meals and help families in need. Join a community of givers and\nensure no one goes to bed hungry..
Your support ensures that food reaches those who need it most. Partner with us to build a worldwithout hunger...
See where your donations go and how they change lives. Transparency and trust areour priorities...
Enter your Phone number or Email address to sign in and help share food with those in need. Make a difference today!:)

Terms & Conditions
Last Updated: February 7, 2025
Welcome to Zero Hunger! These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our app and services. By accessing or using the app, you agree to these terms.
1. User Eligibility
- You must be at least 18 years old to use this app.\n- If you are under 18, parental supervision is required.
2. Account Registration
- You must provide accurate information during signup.\n- You are responsible for maintaining your account security.
3. Donations & Food Distribution
- Donations must comply with food safety standards.\n- Zero Hunger does not guarantee the quality or condition of donated food.
4. Prohibited Activities

You agree not to:
- Misuse the app for fraudulent activities.
- Post false or misleading information.
- Violate any laws while using this service.
5. Privacy Policy
- We collect and store user data as per our Privacy Policy.\n- Your personal data will not be shared without consent.
6. Liability Disclaimer
- Zero Hunger is not liable for any food-related issues.\n- We do not assume responsibility for third-party interactions.
7. Termination of Account
- We may suspend or terminate your account for violating these terms.\n- You may delete your account at any time.
8. Changes to Terms
- We reserve the right to update these terms.\n- Changes will be notified via the app.
9. Contact Us
For any questions, reach out at support@zerohunger.com
